decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to control the pace of the game by utilizing a combination of disruption spells and efficient creatures to maintain board presence while disrupting the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to apply pressure on the opponent while also protecting its own resources through counterspells and removal spells. The inclusion of cards like Thoughtseize, Force of Will, and Daze allows the deck to disrupt the opponent's strategy while cards like Fatal Push and Murktide Regent provide a strong offense. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's aggressive tempo strategy.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Archon of Cruelty using cards like Entomb and Animate Dead, and then bringing them back into play with Reanimate or Shallow Grave. It also includes disruption through Thoughtseize, Cabal Therapy, and Unmask to control the opponent's hand. The deck aims to win the game by creating powerful board states early on through reanimation, overwhelming the opponent before they can set up their own game plan.

The main focus of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while applying pressure with aggressive creatures. By utilizing cards like Thoughtseize, Daze, and Force of Will to disrupt the opponent's strategy, the deck aims to maintain control of the game tempo. At the same time, utilizing cards like Fatal Push and Brazen Borrower to remove threats on the board. The deck also includes card draw and selection spells like Brainstorm and Ponder to ensure consistency in drawing into the right cards. Overall, the deck aims to control the game tempo and apply pressure to secure victory.

The main idea behind this deck is to quickly and efficiently get powerful creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Atraxa, Grand Unifier onto the battlefield using cards like Show and Tell and Sneak Attack. This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big threats early in the game and protect those threats with counterspells like Force of Will and Flusterstorm. The use of mana acceleration cards like Lotus Petal and Simian Spirit Guide allows for quick and explosive plays, while also utilizing the combo potential of the deck.

The main focus of this deck is to combine the cards Painter's Servant and Grindstone to create a powerful combo that mills the opponent's entire deck. This combo is supported by mana acceleration from cards like Mox Opal and Lotus Petal, as well as card draw and recursion from Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student. The deck also includes disruption with cards like Force of Will and Sink into Stupor to control the game until the combo can be assembled and executed.

The deck is centered around quickly assembling a combo that allows the player to win the game without casting any spells. By utilizing cards like Boggart Trawler, Dark Ritual, and Pact of Negation, the deck aims to quickly mill cards from the library to put Thassa's Oracle onto the battlefield and win the game on the spot. The deck also includes disruption cards like Duress and Thoughtseize to protect the combo and disrupt opponent's plans. With a low land count and a high number of mana acceleration spells, the deck is designed for speed and efficiency in executing its game plan.

This Legacy 1 vs 1 deck revolves around using artifacts to establish a strong control over the game. By utilizing cards like Defense Grid, Chalice of the Void, and Karn, the Great Creator, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while controlling the game with powerful artifacts. The inclusion of Grim Monolith and Urza's lands allows for quick mana generation, while cards like Glaring Fleshraker and Kozilek's Command provide additional interaction and removal options. The ultimate goal is to establish a prison-like board state using artifacts and control the game until victory is achieved.

The primary focus of this deck is to utilize the Cephalid Breakfast combo, which involves using Cephalid Illusionist in combination with Nomads en-Kor to quickly mill through your library. This allows you to set up a graveyard with cards like Narcomoeba and Dread Return, enabling you to bring back powerful creatures like Nadu, Winged Wisdom or Thassa's Oracle for a rapid win condition. The deck also includes disruption elements like Force of Will and Prismatic Ending to control the game and protect your combo.
